message.name: ERR_TRAINING_FV_TRAINING_NAME_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_PARTICIPANT_CAN_NOT_DELETE
message.locale: This training, %1s, is included in one or more training program(s), it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_SERVICEOFFERING_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: This training, %1s, is included in the service offering, %2s, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_SOTRAININGREQUIREMENT_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: This training, %1s, is included as a training requirement for one or more service offering(s), it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_LICENSETRAININGREQUIREMENT_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: This training, %1s, is included as a training requirement for one or more license(s), it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_SOTRAININGREQUIREMENT_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: This training, %1s, has been added as a training requirement for service offering(s), training name cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAINING_XRV_TRAINING_ADDED_TO_LICENSETRAININGREQUIREMENT_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: This training, %1s, has been added as a training requirement for one or more License Type(s), training name cannot be modified.
